entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
